No map available Search rooms Error accessing TUMonline Please make sure your TUMonline access token has been activated and the corresponding rights are set. No TUMonline access token was set Please set your TUMonline access token in the Settings to access TUMonline features. Sorry, something went wrong. Click here to retry. Your TUMonline access token is already set. If you generate a new token, the old one becomes useless. Your TUM ID is invalid Your TUMonline access token is invalid. Your TUMonline access token could not be generated. Your TUMonline access token is not enabled. Head to TUMonline to enable it. No Internet connection No data to show. Your TUMonline access token doesn’t have the rights to access this function. You reached the request limit for TUMonline. Try again later. Token limit reached. You have delete an access token in TUMonline before you can continue. Unknown error. TUMonline is currently unavailable. Average grade Estimated average. Please refer to TUMOnline for the precise one. Show Column Chart Show Pie Chart Result:  Semester Examiner Mode All Grades Date ECTS You don\'t have any grades yet. TUM Identification Role Your role at TUM. Either student, employee or guest. Student Employee Guest Cards Startpage Notifications Extras Open Startup-Wizard The Startup-Wizard helps you in order to set the basic preferences for accessing TUMonline services and the layout of this App. Account Log out Disconnect from TUMonline Are you sure you want to log out? Logout failed Do you want to try again? Employee Mode Some unnecessary items like grades and tuition fees are hidden in this mode. Clear Cache Deletes all data which was downloaded by the TUM Campus App and stored on your device. Are you sure you want to delete all data? Successfully cleared cache Services Silent Service The device will be automatically put into silent mode during a lecture. Background Mode (Recommended) Content will automatically be updated once per day if you’re in the Munich area. Background Mode activation Always WiFi only In-App-Tutorial Activates help mode for instruction on how to use this App. About the App Information Facebook https://m.facebook.com/TUMCampus fb://facewebmodal/f?href=https://www.facebook.com/TUMCampus GitHub Contribute on GitHub https://github.com/TUM-Dev/Campus-Android Open-source licences Legal notes to licences Appearance Language Design Theme System default Light Dark Not connected Connect to TUMonline To setup TUMonline access, you need to provide your TUM ID.\n\nThe ID has the format ga12abc. Skip Next The TUMonline access token was successfully generated\n\nPlease enable the token in TUMonline now via Services/Token-Management or follow the link in the email from TUMonline which you will receive shortly.\nMake sure the rights you want to gain in the app are set under Specific Rights. Step 1 Step 2 Step 3 If activated, the device will go into silent mode if a lecture appointment has been recognized. Activate or deactivate Background Mode. If activated, content will be fetched once per day to keep your TUM Campus App up to date. Go to TUM Campus App No link existing. The Content was last updated %s. Next lecture Restore cards Card hidden You are reregistered for %s! You have to reregister until %s! Undo Swipe left or right to hide a card. If you want to hide a card permanently or you want to be notified if a new card is available open card-settings by long pressing on a card (f) meatless dish \n(v) vegan dish \n(S) dish with pork \n(R) dish with beef \n(GQB) Certified Quality - Bavaria \n(99) dish with alcohol \n\n1 with dyestuff \n2 with preservative \n3 with antioxidant \n4 with flavor enhancers \n5 sulphured \n6 blackened (olive) \n8 with phosphate \n9 with sweeteners \n10 contains a source of phenylalanine \n11 with sugar and sweeteners Ingredients Cafeteria Notification Settings Invalid time. Pick a time ranging from %d to %d. Version: %1$s Send e-mail feedback Send feedback Feedback for TUM Campus App The TUM Campus App is being developed by volunteers, students of the Android practical course and employees of the Chair of Operating Systems led by Professor Dr. Baumgarten. The app can be used on smartphones and tablets and is available for both iOS and Android.\n\nYou can reach us via the feedback form in the app or via email (app@tum.de) if you have any special concerns or requests. Query must be at least %d chars long Default Cafeteria Default Station Klinikum Großhadern Cafeteria Displays the cafeteria menu Shows you the departure times of public transport Shows information about your next lecture Reminds you when you have to pay your fees Advertises selected news Notifies you about new messages Chat Open card settings Always hide card To receive notifications on your phone you have to enable Wearable Display Opens Closes Closed der tu film IMDb-Rating Year of release Runtime Genres Director Actors Description No upcoming movies Unfortunately there are no more online tickets available for this movie.\nAdditional tickets can be purchased at our evening box office or our advance ticket sales desks. Eduroam Setup Setup eduroam Setup Eduroam now Password Don’t ask again Do you want to connect to eduroam now? Set up eduroam Allows you to easily set up eduroam Wi-Fi connection PIN-Lock To set up the wireless access a PIN lock is required.\nIf you don’t already use PIN lock you can set it up here. Enable PIN-Lock Data-Backup For safety reasons, the data backup must be disabled to avoid that the TUM credentials are stored unencrypted on the Google servers.\nUnder ‘Backup & restore’ > ‘Back up my data’ to disable. Disable Data-Backup Eduroam successfully configured Configuration failed!\nDo you have a manually created wifi profile? We cannot overwrite it so please delete it! Install certificate Certificate You have to install a CA-Root-certificate to enable secure connection with server. Just click ‘Install certificate’ and confirm with ‘OK’. Enable Wifi The first start may take a few minutes TUM Campus App does not save the password, but Android WifiManager does. Website Switch map Directions to Categories to show News sources Only latest article Shows only the latest article. Otherwise all articles of the selected sources are shown. Lecture Chat If activated, you will be able to join lecture chat rooms, where you and your fellow students can discuss. Chat terms Terms must be accepted to use group chat! Please activate your public key first You joined the chat room! Change view mode Anonymous Bug Reports Support the TCA team by sending anonymous bug reports which include: stack trace, logfile, Android version, app version and screen resolution. Something is wrong with your chat registration! Verification error occurred Room timetable Newspread Select which newspread you want to be shown. Edit Auto-join new lecture rooms If you subscribe to a new lecture, the app will automatically add you to the lecture’s chat room. Add person to chat room New chat room Join chat room Invalid chat room New chat room Select a name for your chat room. The name can not be changed afterwards!\n\n Just now Yesterday Add widget Mensa Widget TUM Configure the cards to show A new version of the Tum Campus App has been released on %s. Tap to download now. Help us to spread the word about the TUM Campus App. Like us on Facebook, suggest an exciting idea on GitHub or send an e-mail telling us what you think. mailto:app@tum.de Support us TUM Campus App needs permission to access your calendar to be able to sync it with your TUM calendar. TUM Campus App needs permission to access your location to display useful information, e.g. the menus of cafeterias around you or timetables of your nearest MVV station. If you do not grant this permission, you will still be able to configure your location in the settings. TUM Campus App needs permission to access your contacts to be able to add this person to your contacts. Grant Permission Cancel OK Published on: Chat is not setup properly, please rerun the wizard via the settings! der tu film More Information Event plan Please connect to internet in order to proceed the first app start card_transition TUMonline Terms must be accepted to use group chat! in minutes at Fix eduroam Fix it now We have detected an insecure eduroam wifi configuration. You are subject to leaking information about you and your account. DNS Name is not set You have configured eduroam without specifying the home institution (e.g. @eduroam.mwn.de) in your username. This means that eduroam won\'t work when you\'re not on the TUM campus. Anonymous Identity not correct Usage Tap your favorite transportation lines to highlight them. Tap again to revert them back to normal. MVV Widget TUM Select station No station selected Offline or no data available Automatic reload Will consume Energy and Data Timetable Widget TUM Select lectures No lectures planned :) Not a valid TUM-ID. Please enter your password. It will not be saved. Facilities Nearby Facilities Barrier-free Toilets Elevators Delete old eduroam profile Open Wi-Fi preferences Done The Wi-Fi profile has to be deleted because the app doesn’t have permission to overwrite configurations. Open the Wi-Fi preferences, select eduroam and then click Forget. Feedback TUM in General TUM Campus App What would you like us to know?
